properties.displayName: Allowed VM Images for Resource Groups containing a specific Suffix
properties.description: This Policy will prevent VM images not listed by this Policy from being deployed to Resource Groups containing a suffix that you define here.

metadata.description: Resource Groups containing this suffix will be permitted to deploy only the VM images definied in other parts of this Policy.

Publishers listed here are the only ones approved to be deployed to the target Resource Group. More granularity can be achieved with the Offers parameter below. Use this command to get a list of Publishers: Get-AzVMImagePublisher -Location ''

Offers listed here are the only ones approved to be deployed to the target Resource Group. If you want less granularity use the Publishers parameter. Use this command to get a list of Offers: Get-AzVMImageOffer -Location '' -PublisherName ''

metaData.description: Deny, Audit or Disable the execution of the Policy
